name: Commando Training & K'lor'slug
Text: 'Deploy on table. If your character or non-[Independent Starship] starship in battle is about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead lost at end of battle (if forfeited, forfeit for 0).  Rebels (except Jedi or [Permanent Weapon] characters) ignore location deploytment restrictions (and ''power -1'') in their game text, apply their Endor deployment modifiers at any location, and are immune to Bad Feeling Have I.  Your Interrupts that retrieve exactly 1 Force (except Corellian Retort) are not stacked on Do They Have A Code Clearance?. Cannot be canceled. (Immune to Alter.)',
